# Preface

## OpenLayers <span class="into-the-blue">4 R</span> is easy to install

```{r}
require("devtools")

install_github("crazycapivara/openlayers")
```

## And fun to use

```{r}
require("geojsonio")

ol() %>%
  add_stamen_tiles() %>%
  add_features(us_cities) %>%
  add_drag_and_drop()
```
